class=\"in-b\" src=\"https://fightnetwork.com/wp-content/plugins/fightnetwork_widgets/law.png\" alt=\"LAW\"></h2>                                                                <div             <ul>\n                        <li class=\"jp-play ui-state-default\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-play ui-icon ui-icon-play\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"play\">play</a></li>\n                        <li class=\"jp-pause ui-state-default\" style=\"display: none;\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-pause ui-icon ui-icon-pause\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"pause\" style=\"display:                    <li class=\"jp-repeat ui-state-default\" style=\"display: list-item;\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-repeat ui-icon ui-icon-refresh\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"repeat\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"max volume\" style=\"display: inline;\">max volume</a></li>\n                    </ul>\n                    <div class=\"podcast-date\">APR 21/17</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-progress-slider ui-slider ui-slider-horizontal ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all\"><div class=\"ui-slider-range ui-widget-header ui-corner-all ui-slider-range-min\" style=\"width: 0%;\"></div><span class=\"ui-slider-handle ui-state-default ui-corner-all\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0%;\"></span></div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-volume-slider ui-slider ui-slider-horizontal ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all\"><div class=\"ui-slider-range ui-widget-header ui-corner-all ui-slider-range-min\" style=\"width: 80%;\"></div><span class=\"ui-slider-handle ui-state-default ui-corner-all\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 80%;\"></span></div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-current-time\">00:00</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-duration\">00:00</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-clearboth\"></div>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"jp-no-solution\" style=\"display: none;\">\n                    <span>Update Required</span>\n                    To play the media you will need to either update your browser to a recent version or update\n                    your <a href=\"http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/\" target=\"_blank\">Flash plugin</a>.\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n                jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_0\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/LAW-BAUER-POLLOCK-APRIL-21-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_0\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n  <img width=\"283\" height=\"163\" src=\"https://fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/170421_RAW_WCWStarrcade88-283x163.jpg\">\n                </a>\n                <div class=\"jp-gui ui-icon-volume-on\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"max volume\" style=\"display: inline;\">max volume</a></li>\n                    </ul>\n                    <div class=\"podcast-date\">APR 21/17</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-progress-slider ui-slider ui-slider-horizontal ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all\"><div class=\"ui-slider-range ui-widget-header ui-corner-all class=\"jp-volume-slider ui-slider ui-slider-horizontal ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all\"><div class=\"ui-slider-range ui-widget-header ui-corner-all ui-slider-range-min\" style=\"width:            <div class=\"jp-duration\">00:00</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-clearboth\"></div>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"jp-no-solution\" style=\"display: href=\"http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/\" target=\"_blank\">Flash plugin</a>.\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n                jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_1\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/REVIEW-A-WAI-NWA-Starrcade-1988.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_1\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n                                                            <div id=\"jquery_jplayer_2\" class=\"jp-jplayer 6599718\" style=\"width: 0px; height: 0px;\"><img id=\"jp_poster_2\" style=\"width: 0px; height: 0px; display: none;\"><audio id=\"jp_audio_2\" preload=\"metadata\" src=\"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/THE-MMA-REPORT-APRIL-20-2017.mp3\"></audio></div>\n            <div id=\"jp_container_2\" class=\"clearfix jp-container\">\n                <a href=\"https://fightnetwork.com/law/april-20-the-mma-report-feat-stephen-thompson-cub-swanson-cody-saftic/\" target=\"_blank\" play the media you will need to either update your browser to a recent version or update\n                    your <a href=\"http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/\" target=\"_blank\">Flash plugin</a>.\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n                jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_2\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/THE-MMA-REPORT-APRIL-20-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_2\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_3\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/whtsNXT-Apr20-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_3\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n play the media you will need to either update your browser to a recent version or update\n                    your <a href=\"http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/\" target=\"_blank\">Flash plugin</a>.\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n                jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_4\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/REVIEW-A-SMACKDOWN-April-19-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_4\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n                    <a jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_0\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/LAW-BAUER-POLLOCK-APRIL-21-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_0\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n                                                            <div id=\"jquery_jplayer_1\" class=\"jp-jplayer 6599789\" style=\"width: 0px; height: 0px;\"><img id=\"jp_poster_1\" style=\"width: 0px; height: 0px; display: none;\"><audio id=\"jp_audio_1\" preload=\"metadata\" src=\"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/REVIEW-A-WAI-NWA-Starrcade-1988.mp3\"></audio></div>\n            <div id=\"jp_container_1\" class=\"clearfix jp-container\">\n                <a href=\"https://fightnetwork.com/law/review-a-wai-nwa-starrcade-1988-w-dylan-gott/\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"post-thumbnail\">\n                    <img width=\"283\" height=\"163\" src=\"https://fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/170421_RAW_WCWStarrcade88-283x163.jpg\">\n                </a>\n                <div class=\"jp-gui ui-widget ui-widget-content\">\n                    <ul>\n                        <li class=\"jp-play ui-state-default\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-play ui-icon ui-icon-play\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"play\">play</a></li>\n                        <li class=\"jp-pause ui-state-default\" style=\"display: none;\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-pause ui-icon ui-icon-pause\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"stop\">stop</a></li>\n                        <li class=\"jp-repeat ui-state-default\" style=\"display: list-item;\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-repeat ui-icon ui-icon-refresh\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"repeat\" style=\"display: inline;\">repeat</a></li>\n                        <li class=\"jp-repeat-off ui-state-default ui-state-active\" style=\"display: none;\"><a ui-state-default\" style=\"display: list-item;\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-mute ui-icon ui-icon-volume-off\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"mute\" style=\"display: inline;\">mute</a></li>\n                        <li class=\"jp-unmute ui-state-default ui-state-active\" style=\"display: none;\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-unmute ui-icon ui-icon-volume-off\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"unmute\" style=\"display: none;\">unmute</a></li>\n                        <li class=\"jp-volume-max ui-state-default\" style=\"display: list-item;\"><a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"jp-volume-max ui-icon ui-icon-volume-on\" tabindex=\"1\" title=\"max volume\" style=\"display: inline;\">max volume</a></li>\n                    </ul>\n                    <div class=\"podcast-date\">APR 21/17</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-progress-slider ui-slider ui-slider-horizontal ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all\"><div class=\"ui-slider-range ui-widget-header ui-corner-all ui-slider-range-min\" style=\"width: 0%;\"></div><span class=\"ui-slider-handle ui-state-default ui-corner-all\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 0%;\"></span></div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-volume-slider ui-slider ui-slider-horizontal ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all\"><div class=\"ui-slider-range ui-widget-header ui-corner-all ui-slider-range-min\" style=\"width: 80%;\"></div><span class=\"ui-slider-handle ui-state-default ui-corner-all\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"left: 80%;\"></span></div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-current-time\">00:00</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-duration\">108:21</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-clearboth\"></div>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"jp-no-solution\" style=\"display: none;\">\n                    <span>Update Required</span>\n                    To play the media you will need to either update your browser to a recent version or update\n                    your <a href=\"http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/\" target=\"_blank\">Flash plugin</a>.\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n                jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_1\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/REVIEW-A-WAI-NWA-Starrcade-1988.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_1\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_2\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/THE-MMA-REPORT-APRIL-20-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_2\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n            <div class=\"jp-duration\">61:30</div>\n                    <div class=\"jp-clearboth\"></div>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"jp-no-solution\" style=\"display: none;\">\n                    <span>Update Required</span>\n                    To play the media you will need to either update your browser to a recent version or update\n                    your <a href=\"http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/\" target=\"_blank\">Flash plugin</a>.\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n                jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_3\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/whtsNXT-Apr20-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_3\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"volume\", ui.value);\n                        }\n                    });\n                });\n            </script>\n              </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n                jQuery(document).ready(function () {\n                    /*\n                     * jQuery UI ThemeRoller\n                     *\n                     * Includes code to hide GUI volume controls on mobile devices.\n                     * ie., Where volume controls have no effect. See noVolume option for more info.\n                     *\n                     * Includes fix for Flash solution with MP4 files.\n                     * ie., The timeupdates are ignored for 1000ms after changing the play-head.\n                     * Alternative solution would be to use the slider option: {animate:false}\n                     */\n\n                    var myPlayer = jQuery(\"#jquery_jplayer_4\"),\n                        myPlayerData,\n                        fixFlash_mp4, // Flag: The m4a and m4v Flash player gives some old currentTime values when changed.\n                        fixFlash_mp4_id, // Timeout ID used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        ignore_timeupdate, // Flag used with fixFlash_mp4\n                        options = {\n                            ready: function (event) {\n                                // Hide the volume slider on mobile browsers. ie., They have no effect.\n                                if (event.jPlayer.status.noVolume) {\n                                    // Add a class and then CSS rules deal with it.\n                                    jQuery(\".jp-gui\").addClass(\"jp-no-volume\");\n                                }\n                                // Determine if Flash is being used and the mp4 media type is supplied. BTW, Supplying both mp3 and mp4 is pointless.\n                                fixFlash_mp4 = event.jPlayer.flash.used && /m4a|m4v/.test(event.jPlayer.options.supplied);\n                                // Setup the player with media.\n                                jQuery(this).jPlayer(\"setMedia\", {\n                                    mp3: \"https://cdn.fightnetwork.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/REVIEW-A-SMACKDOWN-April-19-2017.mp3\",\n                                });\n                            },\n                            timeupdate: function (event) {\n                                if (!ignore_timeupdate) {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.status.currentPercentAbsolute);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            volumechange: function (event) {\n                                if (event.jPlayer.options.muted) {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                } else {\n                                    myControl.volume.slider(\"value\", event.jPlayer.options.volume);\n                                }\n                            },\n                            swfPath: \"../dist/jplayer\",\n                            supplied: \"mp3\",\n                            cssSelectorAncestor: \"#jp_container_4\",\n                            wmode: \"window\",\n                            keyEnabled: true\n                        },\n                        myControl = {\n                            progress: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-progress-slider\"),\n                            volume: jQuery(options.cssSelectorAncestor + \" .jp-volume-slider\")\n                        };\n\n                    // Instance jPlayer\n                    myPlayer.jPlayer(options);\n\n                    // A pointer to the jPlayer data object\n                    myPlayerData = myPlayer.data(\"jPlayer\");\n\n                    // Define hover states of the buttons\n                    jQuery('.jp-gui ul li').hover(\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        },\n                        function () {\n                            jQuery(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');\n                        }\n                    );\n\n                    // Create the progress slider control\n                    myControl.progress.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 100,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.1,\n                        value: 0,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            var sp = myPlayerData.status.seekPercent;\n                            if (sp > 0) {\n                                // Apply a fix to mp4 formats when the Flash is used.\n                                if (fixFlash_mp4) {\n                                    ignore_timeupdate = true;\n                                    clearTimeout(fixFlash_mp4_id);\n                                    fixFlash_mp4_id = setTimeout(function () {\n                                        ignore_timeupdate = false;\n                                    }, 1000);\n                                }\n                                // Move the play-head to the value and factor in the seek percent.\n                                myPlayer.jPlayer(\"playHead\", ui.value * (100 / sp));\n                            } else {\n                                // Create a timeout to reset this slider to zero.\n                                setTimeout(function () {\n                                    myControl.progress.slider(\"value\", 0);\n                                }, 0);\n                            }\n                        }\n                    });\n\n                    // Create the volume slider control\n                    myControl.volume.slider({\n                        animate: \"fast\",\n                        max: 1,\n                        range: \"min\",\n                        step: 0.01,\n                        value: jQuery.jPlayer.prototype.options.volume,\n                        slide: function (event, ui) {\n                            myPlayer.jPlayer(\"option\", \"muted\", false);\n
